original_title: The Last Chance Detectives: Legend of the Desert Bigfoot
overview: It travels only at night, is taller than any person and has incredible strength. Can the legends about Bigfoot be true? When metal doors are ripped apart and campers are terrorized, kid detectives Mike, Ben, Winnie and Spence set out to solve the mystery - and learn about integrity in the process.
title: The Last Chance Detectives: Legend of the Desert Bigfoot
